name: Topos
description: A community of scientists dedicated to life-long learning. Lots of scientific minds who are excited about the humanities.

name: Incepto
description: A family of intellectual houses, passionate about technological progress and its influence on societal change. A big startup presence here.

name: Archive
description: Values curiosity, reliability, intentionality, and benevolence. Composed of a group of extremely diverse residents.

name: Gamma House
description: A house for young students, researchers, and hackers, filled with curiosity and kindness. (June 5th to September 1st, 2021)

name: Rainbow Mansion
description: A community house full of aspiring astronauts, virtual reality engineers, makers, entrepreneurs, Antarctica explorers, and most importantly, friends.

name: Red Door TV
description: A collective of talented creatives, musicians, artists, Twitch streamers, YouTubers, OnlyFan creators, and more.
